dict.string: catloaf / Original design of letterforms by SQUARE ENIX CO., LTD.

A re-work of Norvrandt typeface with extended language support and Opentype features. The original letterforms were from Norvrandt standard alphabets in Encyclopaedia Eorzea III - The World of FINAL FANTASY XIV. All company, product, and system names mentioned herein are trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective companies.

catloaf / Original design of letterforms by SQUARE ENIX CO., LTD.
猫面包 / 源字形设计来自 SQUARE ENIX CO., LTD.

A re-work of Norvrandt typeface with extended language support and Opentype features. The original letterforms were from Norvrandt standard alphabets in Encyclopaedia Eorzea III - The World of FINAL FANTASY XIV. All company, product, and system names mentioned herein are trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective companies.
改良型诺弗兰特文字进行了再设计，增加了更多语言支持与 Opentype 特性。 源字形来自《艾欧泽亚百科全书II》的诺弗兰特文字字母表。 此处提及的所有公司、产品和系统名称均为其各自公司的商标或注册商标。
One brings shadow, one brings light Two-toned echoes tumbling through time Threescore wasted, ten cast aside Four-fold knowing, no end in sight
